title: FiveG
author: FiveG
content: Is been a hard knocked to everyone trading bitcoin this seasons especially investment, my friend was sore disappointed for the recent falling of price because he bought $1000 bitcoin but the truth is that we cannot foresees the future in today, this is not the first time the price is Reding down, we should take advantage of this time at least you can use a small to purchase high value bitcoin. I wish we've profound bitcoin price analyst here, many people really wants to know the cause of continues price deflected, if you've ideas please your comments will be very important here. We newbies this days fall victims a lot because of ignorance of cryptosystem. Let's talk as a family.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: If your friend is going to get nervous because the price drops a little, he's doing it wrong. Either he is not thinking long term or that $1,000 is money he may need in the short to medium term. It is better to study bitcoin, its history and price behaviour in cycles to get an idea of what is to come, and be prepared for HODL for a long time to come, if you do things right, a little rise or fall in price should not even faze you. Otherwise, I can already see your friend selling at $1100 because he's short the money when he can easily make x5 in a couple of years.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Crypto is not easy and thats exactly what they'd lean by now of they invest BTC while it goes $30k just weeks ago. Newbies have to also endure what the old investors did back in 2018. They can look at this as a test of patience. And the more you'd be tested if you got altcoins.But it will be rewarding when all these bears are gone. Its not easy to keep waiting but fortune favors the bold.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: This is why dollar-cost averaging(DCA) is one of the best strategies especially for newbies — because lump sum buys gets them to panic over price drops/crashes. At least with DCA, a price crash could make them automatically look at it as an opportunity.

comments.body: BTC was below $20K just a few months ago, so it's not even the cheapest this year. Yeah, I've bought some, but this is not the best opportunity we had recently.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Bitcoin and Ethereum didn’t really have a huge drop. It’s the alts that got hit with some losing 25% in a single day. Bitcoin is fairly safe since it’s definitely not a security. Maybe same with ETH. The issue is that the rest might be called a security and no exchange will be able to trade them if they serve us customers.Hence why the sell off started. I also think that Binance US will close up shop in USA. Basically not worth it for them with all this regulation going on. Fiat deposits and withdraws are also closed. So it’s basically crypto only at the moment.

comments.author: Lorence.xD
comments.body: If your friend are already have knowledge about Bitcoin then for sure he's aware with its volatility nature. There's nothing to be sad those downfall of Bitcoin's value would only be a bad effect to inexperienced people or newbie. As a good trader or investor you would take advantage with its volatility which is the reason why people love Bitcoin. Just invest again the money that you afford to lose and aim high again. If would be impossible for us to profit with experiencing losses.

comments.author: bluebit25
comments.body: The fear of lack of knowledge and experience always appears a lot of people participating in the cryptocurrency market, when the price rises they fear that it is too high to buy, when the price drops they are skeptical about the future. future with the market.  Can be strong in decision making and responsible for their own actions what to do next when dealing with the crypto market. If you are looking to invest in Bitcoin or any cryptocurrency, consider it carefully and dig deep into it before deciding to invest. Make sure you have all the knowledge and experience you need to make informed investment decisions. I have also noticed that many newcomers to the cryptocurrency market still do not fully understand the cryptosystem and the risks of this trading. So learn how it works, the risks, and how to protect your information and assets from fraud or losing money.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: Truly speaking no one can predict the future with 100% accuracy because then they would become super natural. What we do is use our past charts and market sentiment to predict a possibility that can happen. The price dropping means the chance to buy while the price rise is a chance to sell. This is very basic concept of trading.What the OP did not mention is the price at which their friend bought Bitcoin. If bought at the top, then that mistake should never be repeated again. But all is not lost because rise will happen in future, since then they should keep patience. These are cyclical changes and should be followed like that.
